about_the_game:
summary:
You wake up from the endless darkness, you get a chance to leave this boring world, you gain another life in a world full of swords and magic. A strange land is full of unknown adventures. Destroy the world or save it, it is your decision to make. In the edge of this world, something is waiting for you, a hidden secret. You will have to find the answer and the reason why you come to this world.

It is an open-world RPG game, you can only explore the first part of the land for now (The rest of lands are still developing).
We plan to create many main stories, based on the player's choices, the story may be different (The main idea we try to create for players).
Of course, It also means multiple ends as well.
We plan to make stories and meanings for every NPCs, but it may take a lot of developing time to do so.
The game will have a huge amount of hidden quests, items and stories (We believe exploring is a key and interesting feature in open-world games).

Some uncertain developing features (You may discuss and advise in the Steam Discussion Board):
Players can choose their classes (player can paly any classes in the team)
Players can have their own town or castle and may be able to improve it.
A more complex fighting system, by mixing different classes, elements and so on to get higher damage.
Feel free and welcome to tell us any other ideas and suggestions.

You can contact us on Steam Discussion Board or email us 1097630238@qq.com.
